rule.description: Value added to registry key has Base64-like pattern

system.message:
"Process Create:

Description: Registry Console Tool
Product: Microsoft速 Windows速 Operating System
Company: Microsoft Corporation
OriginalFileName: reg.exe
CommandLine: REG.exe  ADD HKCU\Environment /v UserInitMprLogonScript /t REG_SZ /d "C:\Users\User\AppData\Local\Temp\art.bat" /f
CurrentDirectory: C:\Users\User\AppData\Local\Temp\
User: DESKTOP-1I88MER\User
LogonGuid: {bb035c3e-360f-67cc-441e-0b0000000000}

ParentCommandLine: "cmd.exe" /c echo "echo Art "Logon Script" atomic test was successful. >> %USERPROFILE%\desktop\T1037.001-log.txt" > %temp%\art.bat & REG.exe ADD HKCU\Environment /v UserInitMprLogonScript /t REG_SZ /d "%temp%\art.bat" /f

eventdata.parentCommandLine: \"cmd.exe\" /c echo \"echo Art \"Logon Script\" atomic test was successful. >> %USERPROFILE%\\desktop\\T1037.001-log.txt\" > %temp%\\art.bat & REG.exe ADD HKCU\\Environment /v UserInitMprLogonScript /t REG_SZ /d \"%temp%\\art.bat\" /f
